s: Explore the world of Shrinky Dinks – the beloved brand for creative minds of all ages. Discover our history, innovative products, and endless possibilities for crafting fun!

3 weeks ago - The first kits were sold at a local shopping mall and became very popular. Shrinky Dinks were soon licensed to be manufactured by the major toy companies of the time such as Milton Bradley, Colorforms, Western Publishing and Skyline Toys. Alex Brands acquired Shrinky Dinks in 2014.
